GSD.description:
fbdev: smscufx: Fix use-after-free in ufx_ops_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit e2e5264dcf5796559869750a2d6943ac88fe3918. For more details please see the references link.
